title: The JRVP Promise

description:
A man who had pig heart transplant is guilty of 1988 stabbing, a man  claims he lost 1.5 inches in penis size due to Covid and a model says Drake put hot sauce in condoms to kill sperm and not get trapped. 

 

Visit ATHLETICGREENS.com/JRVP  for a FREE 1 year supply of Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase.

This V Day, it’s time to join the 4 million men worldwide who trust MANSCAPED™, the leaders in below the waist grooming with our exclusive offer - go to manscaped.com and use code [JRVP] for 20% off + Free Shipping. 

Freshly is offering our listeners $40 off your first two orders at freshly.com/JRVP

This episode is brought to you by Paint Your Life! Get twenty percent off your painting and Free shipping! Text the word VANITY to sixty-four thousand (64-000)
